about_the_game:
A young bard gets into trouble when her father disappears and leaves her with a massive amount of debt with the local mob. Desperately to protect her father, the bard offers to pay back the debt through the tavern her father left behind. Having helped her father her whole life with the tavern, along with being a skilled bard, she manages to convince the mobster boss of giving her a chance. Of course, running a tavern alone isn't easy, and it's especially not easy with the debt having over her head as well as well as the mob. Will she be able to save her tavern and father? Will she be able to save herself from the mob?

Game contains VN style plot progression paired with turn-based tactics where the player serves the needs of the customers while combatting their complaints.

The game also contains graphic sexual content with animated adult scenes.
